mapper.sql: a.id_ AS "id", a.user_id_ AS "engUserId", a.login_in_time_ AS "loginInTime", a.login_out_time_ AS "loginOutTime", a.current_time_ AS "currentTime", a.auto_login_out_ AS "autoLoginOut", a.current_study_time_ AS "currentStudyTime", a.create_date_ AS "createDate", a.update_date_ AS "updateDate", a.remarks_ AS "remarks", a.del_flag_ AS "delFlag", a.blank_one_ AS "blankOne", a.blank_two_ AS "blankTwo"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.user_id_
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO enguser_option( id_, user_id_, login_in_time_, login_out_time_, current_time_, auto_login_out_, current_study_time_, create_date_, update_date_, remarks_, del_flag_, blank_one_, blank_two_ ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{engUserId}, #{loginInTime}, #{loginOutTime}, #{currentTime}, #{autoLoginOut}, #{currentStudyTime}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{blankOne}, #{blankTwo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE enguser_option SET id_ = #{id}, user_id_ = #{engUserId}, login_in_time_ = #{loginInTime}, login_out_time_ = #{loginOutTime}, current_time_ = #{currentTime}, auto_login_out_ = #{autoLoginOut}, current_study_time_ = #{currentStudyTime}, create_date_ = #{createDate}, update_date_ = #{updateDate}, remarks_ = #{remarks}, del_flag_ = #{delFlag}, blank_one_ = #{blankOne}, blank_two_ = #{blankTwo} WHERE id_ = #{id}
